Class javachart.chart.DateAxis 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class javachart.chart.DateAxis 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Axis
           |
           +----javachart.chart.DateAxis
public class DateAxis
extends Axis
implements AxisInterface
An Axis subclass that automatically creates appropriate labels and increments for Date and Time information. Datasets using this axis are expected to use values that correspond to the long integers used by Java's Date class, albeit cast as doubles

DateAxis(Dataset[], boolean, Plotarea)
Constructs a new Date & Time Axis for the specified Dataset array.

dayString(int)
Return a day name
doDayScale()
Scale by days
doHourScale()
Scale by hours
doMonthScale()
Scale by months
doSecondScale()
Scale by seconds
doWeekScale()
Scale by weeks
doYearScale()
Scale by years
getDayLabel(int)
Return a label based on scaling by days
getHourLabel(int)
Return a label based on scaling by hours
getLabel(double, int)
returns a specified label string
getMinuteLabel(int)
Returns a label for scaling by minutes
getMonthLabel(int)
Return a label based on scaling by months
getScalingType()
Returns the current scaling type.
getSecondLabel(int)
Returns a label based on scaling by seconds
getWeekLabel(int)
Return a label based on scaling by weeks
getYearLabel(int)
Return a label based on scaling by years
monthString(int)
Return a String value for a specified month
scale()
Overrides general scale method in Axis superclass to provide Date specific functionality.
setAxisEnd(double)
Sets an ending Date for this Axis

Sets a starting Date for this Axis

Sets a specified scaling type: e.g.
whereOnAxis(int, int)
Overrides general method in Axis to provide time locations for labels, ticks and grids

DateAxis 
  public DateAxis(Dataset datasets[],
                  boolean yesNo,
                  Plotarea plotarea)
Constructs a new Date & Time Axis for the specified Dataset array. Dataset values are interpreted as time values
Parameters:
datasets - Array of Dataset classes to consider
yesNo - true if this is an X axis
plotarea - The Plotarea bounded by this Axis

setAxisStart 
  public void setAxisStart(double num)
Sets a starting Date for this Axis
Parameters:
num - Axis starting date, cast as a double
Returns:
None
Overrides:

Sets an ending Date for this Axis
Parameters:
num - Axis ending date, cast as a double
Returns:
None

                            int whichElement)
Overrides general method in Axis to provide time locations for labels, ticks and grids
Overrides:
whereOnAxis in class Axis
scale 
  public synchronized void scale()
Overrides general scale method in Axis superclass to provide Date specific functionality.
Overrides:
scale in class Axis
setScalingType 
  public void setScalingType(int typ)
Sets a specified scaling type: e.g. minutes, hours, months, etc.
Parameters:
typ - Type of time scaling: SecondScaling = 1 MinuteScaling = 2 HourScaling = 3 DayScaling = 4 WeekScaling = 5 MonthScaling = 6 YearScaling = 7
getScalingType 
  public int getScalingType()
Returns the current scaling type.

                            int which)
returns a specified label string
Parameters:
unused - not used for DateAxis
which - number of label to return
